definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: I am looking to purchase at wholesale prices goods that are fashion accessories.
sentences.chinese: 我們期望以批發價採購時尚飾品。

sentences.english: But with garlic, the national level of the wholesale prices have tripled.
sentences.chinese: 而大蒜，國家水平的批發價已翻了三倍。

sentences.english: We are giving you the wholesale price.
sentences.chinese: 我們給您的都是批發價。

sentences.english: Minimum order amount in wholesales cost and not inclusive of shipping charges.
sentences.chinese: 最少訂購額是依批發價計算與不包括郵費在內。

sentences.english: The rush for rice in Hong Kong began after wholesale prices spiked in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 泰國的大米批發價格猛漲之後，香港人開始搶購大米。

sentences.english: Quality is absolutely guaranteed, the wholesale price is reasonable, a large quantity of favorably.
sentences.chinese: 質量絕對有保證，批發價格合理，量大從優。

sentences.english: Marullo let me have things wholesale .
sentences.chinese: 馬魯洛允許我照批發價買東西。

sentences.english: The cost of meat in particular is running high, according to a wholesale price survey by the Agriculture Department.
sentences.chinese: 根據農業部的一項批發價調查，肉類價格居高不下。

sentences.english: Warehouse clubs allow members to buy goods at wholesale prices.
sentences.chinese: 倉儲式會員店允許會員以批發價購買商品。

sentences.english: She ran her apartment with thrift and bought her clothes at trade prices.
sentences.chinese: 她持家勤儉，買衣裳花的是批發價錢。

sentences.english: The cost of roasting turkeys doesn't tend to follow actual wholesale prices but is often a loss leader.
sentences.chinese: 烤火雞的費用並不跟隨實際的批發價格走還經常虧本。

sentences.english: Our wholesales price is the most reasonable and cheaper in the market.
sentences.chinese: 我們的批發價格絕對是最優惠的。

sentences.english: Yet, the smaller than expected US corn crop could still push wholesale prices higher.
sentences.chinese: 然而，美國玉米產量小於預期，仍可能推高批發價格。

sentences.english: The state taxes roll-your-own tobacco at 78 percent of the wholesale price, Allen said.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫說，州以78%的批發價徵收自捲菸稅收。

definition: variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
